Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
proceeds from repayments of lines of credit
proceeds from repayments of notes payable
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of senior long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from sale of treasury stock
proceeds from stock based compensation net

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): noncash or part noncash acquisition value of equity consideration
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire other productive assets
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from disposition of discontinued operations
proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
proceeds from equity method investment dividends or distributions return of capital
proceeds from sale of productive assets
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale of equity method investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts and other receivables
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets and liabilities net
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on disposition of business net of income tax expense benefit
gain loss on sale of business
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
impairment of intangible assets excluding goodwill
income loss from equity method investments
income taxes paid excluding taxes associated with gain on disposition of business
income taxes paid on disposition of business

__unmapped__: income tax expense benefit continuing operations discontinued operations extraordinary items
income tax provision excluding taxes associated with gain on disposition of business
increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
